name: myfitnesspal_scrape_recipe
description: Scrape a recipe from MyFitnessPal. Returns name, ingredients, nutrition per serving, and instructions.

steps.code: const name = document.querySelector('h1, [class*="recipe-name"]')?.textContent?.trim()||''; const ingredients = Array.from(document.querySelectorAll('[class*="ingredient"], .ingredient-list li, li.ingredient')).map(el=>el.textContent.trim()).filter(Boolean); const nutrients = {}; document.querySelectorAll('tr, [class*="nutrient"]').forEach(el => { const lbl = el.querySelector('td:first-child, [class*="label"]')?.textContent?.trim()?.toLowerCase()||''; const val = el.querySelector('td:last-child, [class*="value"]')?.textContent?.trim()||''; if(lbl&&val&&lbl.length<30) nutrients[lbl]=val; }); const servings = document.body.innerText.match(/(\d+)\s*servings?/i)?.[1]||''; return { name, ingredients, nutrients, servings, url: window.location.href }
steps.name: page_data
